name: identity_server
long_description:
identity_server Cookbook
===============
This cookbook installs and configures WSO2 Identity Server in Linux systems

Requirements
------------
#### operation systems
Ubuntu 12.04
Ubuntu 12.10

License and Authors
-------------------
Authors: ClearScale <damir@clearscale.net>

identity_server/repo_path.description: Path to repository with WSO2 Identity Server package
identity_server/repo_path.display_name: Path to repository with WSO2 Identity Server package

identity_server/repo_dist.description: Distribution in repository with WSO2 Identity Server package
identity_server/repo_dist.display_name: Distribution in repository with WSO2 Identity Server package

identity_server/repo_comp.description: Components of repository with WSO2 Identity Server package
identity_server/repo_comp.display_name: Components of repository with WSO2 Identity Server package

identity_server/carbon/hostname.description:
Host name or IP address of the machine hosting this server, e.g. www.wso2.org, 192.168.1.10.
    This is will become part of the End Point Reference of the services deployed on this server instance.
identity_server/carbon/hostname.display_name: Host name or IP address of the machine hosting this server.

recipes.identity_server::default: Install and configure WSO2 Identity Server
